alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 9:25PM CDT until May 05 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL FRONTIER AND EASTERN HAYES COUNTIES... At 924 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 9 miles east of Hayes Center, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Hayes Center, Marengo and Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
